Description: Face veil (with head-band); made of a rectangle of black creped silk(?); three gold-coloured coins sewn on end; strip of burgundy velvet attached to end with three black braided cords, with brass tube between velvet and crepe.
Curator's comments: Recorded in the acquisition regsiter as modern Egyptian work, collected about 1920.
Acquisition notes: Af1965,11.1 and 2 are recorded as the gift of Mrs Esther Ciapetti of Wilmslow (the name might alternatively be read as Ciapelli).
